adrFormatAddress: 305 6th Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Louisiana-inspired fast-food chain known for its spicy fried chicken, biscuits & sides.

originalText.text: Love to eat my mayo with a little bit of chicken and bread, this is strike 2 last time they game chicken nuggets that were sitting until they got fully burnt

text.text: Love to eat my mayo with a little bit of chicken and bread, this is strike 2 last time they game chicken nuggets that were sitting until they got fully burnt

originalText.text:
Grand opening of new Popeyes on West 4th. Used to be old an Duane Reade years back.   Redeemed one of the offers via the app without issue in-store.

Staff was nice and friendly. Fast service. Food was nice and fresh as I got fries, tenders, cole slaw and two biscuits.
I didn't get to see how it looked upstairs though.

originalText.text:
I came here  as a delivery courier to pick up orders for two customers on 12/30/2023 at 2:44am. This very unprofessional, disrespectful, scrawny male employee with dreads and a Jamaican/Caribbean accent, hovered over me as I packed the customers order. He stared at me the entire time (racially motivated I’m sure). And as I packed then he demanded I show him my phone to confirm the orders are picked up.  I began to leave and confirm the orders, something I dont need to show him cause I’m not even in my vehicle and ur not entitled to my phone, I showed you their names multiple times, that’s confirmation. After rudely micro managing me, He then began yelling at me at the top of his voice in front of customers. He then followed me as I was leaving, not respecting my personal space. I returned the orders, without hesitation and left the store then reported him to the company. His manager Neema* wasn’t apologetic all for his employee showing NO RESPECT for a person who helps their business operate. I hope Karma gets them good! Savages in the worst way. He wouldn’t like if someone hovered of him as he did his job. And no one likes being yelled at and treated suspiciously.  I don’t recommend this place at all, atrocious service. I read prior reviews and I can vouch at the lack of professionalism and basic decency. Third world service.
Very disrespectful and instigative staff. DO NOT GO!

originalText.text: I really love Popeyes and need for this location to stay so I’m giving feedback only out of love and hope the owner is reading this! The chicken here is off…. It’s not as well coated and crispy and fully, golden brown as it is in other locations. It seems undercooked every time. The gravy is also watery. Literally as liquid as water and not at all thickened. Pls can you fix these two things?? I promise you’ll get more customers!

text.text: I really love Popeyes and need for this location to stay so I’m giving feedback only out of love and hope the owner is reading this! The chicken here is off…. It’s not as well coated and crispy and fully, golden brown as it is in other locations. It seems undercooked every time. The gravy is also watery. Literally as liquid as water and not at all thickened. Pls can you fix these two things?? I promise you’ll get more customers!

originalText.text: Went in on Halloween night to grab a chicken sando real quick. But I also had to use the bathroom and the line was long so I had my cousin wait in line and I went in to use the bathroom. Immediately this big black monkey looking mofo put his hands on me and told me I couldn’t go to the bathroom. There were two other employees there and I said what’s up I’m buying something I just need to go and none of them said nothing. They just all stared at me. I proceeded upstairs. The ugly monkey put his hands on me again. This is when I went to the counter and said I wanted to purchase the cheapest thing on the menu to throw at his ugly face. The guy refused me of course and I left the store.
